data.proxyObjectName: closed dark gray notebook or laptop
data.utilizationMethod: Slide one hand underneath to grasp a single corner while the rest of the notebook hangs below the fist. The bulk of the notebook supplies noticeable mass, so lifting then swinging it downward gives strong inertial pull similar to a sledge-hammer action. Bringing the notebook’s flat edge to meet the desk produces a solid, vibration-rich impact through the rigid cover back into the user’s hand.
